issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Basically, in a tableview since items are reused, the background tasks used to download the images, update when they're done. The effect is to have a mini slideshow in an imageview..this isn't the desired effect.

{html}
fields.summary: Android: ImageView Filled from Remote Source Cycles through multiples

comments.body:
{html}

(from [e59eb446bb155bf330817ed6823bc99e204dbe43]) [#888 state:resolved] An optimistic locking scheme has been added to imageview. If the background tasks token doesn't match the current token, the image is simply discarded http://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/e59eb446bb155...

{html}
